name: onequery
description: Do dataset joins, mergings, filters, mappings, orderings, groupings, foldings (aggregations), visualizations and similar operations on plain old javascript memory, indexedDb, or hybrid structures.  A 'Dataset' is an array of objects with named properties.  Future work on oneQuery will seek to use the same API to work with a server database from node.  This code is NOT ready for production.  Inspired by c# linq method syntax.
author: Paul Wilcox
